message.body: Hi ##### It's Ingrid. We need an art installer for one half day mainly, in the gallery
Do you know anyone with experience hanging work?
####### art- it is a new gallery- we are opening the 9th in old city- if you are interested pls call my boss now bc he needs someone- he'll pay obv: ############
I just told him about you so he'll know who you are
Nice thanks, I'll give him a call in a bit to see if I can do it with my schedule.
